name: Bedge Pictures
description: Wedding Photography company that specializes in capturing the most beautiful moments of your special day.
longDescription: Bedge Pictures is a wedding photography company that specializes in capturing the most beautiful moments of your special day. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for storytelling, we create stunning visual narratives that you will cherish for a lifetime.

name: BOAS
description: Vintage Jeans Ecommerce Brand that supports giving back majority of the proceeds to charity.
longDescription: BOAS is a jeans wholesale company that specializes in providing high-quality denim products to retailers and businesses. With a focus on sustainability and ethical production, they focus on donating larger chunk of the proceeds to charity. One of my contributions was building a custom shopify app to discount products twice daily and also a countdown timer to show the time left till  the discount. I also contributed to building a custom Next.js app that fetches data from the shopify store and displays it in a more user friendly way. The app is built with Typescript and GraphQL, and uses Strapi as a headless CMS to manage the content.

name: WPS Bedge
description: Photography Studio made for creatives to showcase their creativity.
longDescription: Discover the diverse world of WPS (Work & Play Studio), a Multi-Disciplinary Photography Studio that seamlessly blends creativity and expertise allowing creatives to showcase their creativity. With a focus on capturing the essence of each moment, WPS offers a range of services including photography, videography, and creative direction.

name: Lizz Davies
description: Photography Studio tmade for creatives to showcase their creativity.
longDescription: The Employee Voting System is a web application designed to facilitate voting among employees in an organization. It allows employees to cast their votes on various topics, ensuring transparency and engagement in decision-making processes.

name: Business Finder App
description: A mobile app that helps you find businesses using Yelp Fusion API.
longDescription: The Business Finder App is a mobile application that allows users to search for businesses in their area using the Yelp Fusion API. The app provides a user-friendly interface and utilizes the MVVM design pattern for efficient data management.

name: Personal Task Organizer
description: A mobile app that helps you organize your tasks.
longDescription: Ting is a mobile application built with React Native bootstrapped by expo, designed to help users manage and organize their tasks efficiently. State is managed using Redux, ensuring a smooth user experience. The app is designed with a focus on simplicity and usability, making it easy for users to add, edit, and delete tasks. User gets points for completing tasks, which can be redeemed for rewards. The app also includes a weather feature that provides users with real-time weather updates based on their location.

name: F10 Photography
description: F10 Photography is a website designed to showcase the work of a wedding photographer.
longDescription: F10 Photography is a web application designed to showcase the work of a wedding photographer. The website features a clean and modern design, allowing users to easily navigate through the portfolio and view high-quality images.

name: Addict Wellness App
description: Chattee is a mobile app that helps addicts find wellness.
longDescription: Chattee is a mobile application designed to assist individuals struggling with addiction in finding wellness and support. The app provides resources, community connections, and tools for recovery.

name: OCR To Text
description: A web app that converts images to text using OCR.
longDescription: The OCR To Text web application allows users to upload images and convert them into editable text using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. The app utilizes Tesseract.js for accurate text extraction.

name: Hangman Game
description: Explore Hangman where users take the reins in guessing while enjoying prompts and clues for an enhanced gameplay experience.
longDescription: Hangman is a classic word-guessing game where players try to guess a hidden word by suggesting letters within a certain number of guesses. The game features a user-friendly interface and engaging gameplay mechanics.

name: Weather App
description: A mobile app that helps you find the weather using Open Weather API.
longDescription: The Weather App is a mobile application that provides users with real-time weather information using the Open Weather API. The app is designed with a user-friendly interface and follows the MVVM design pattern for efficient data handling. It also utilizes Core Location to provide location-based weather updates.

name: Employee Voting System
description: Best In Uniform is a voting system for employees.
longDescription: The Employee Voting System is a web application designed to facilitate voting among employees in an organization. It allows employees to cast their votes on various topics, ensuring transparency and engagement in decision-making processes.
